snippet.textDisplay: DW covid-19 special is our nr. 1 choice for legitimate information on covid.  For a fortnight now we have been unable to access it on YouTube here in the USA.  It is GREAT to have you back -- please ensure that your programming here continues to be available.  Thank you!

snippet.textDisplay: Derrick Williams ALWAYS  refers to the peer reviewed literature in his answers.  It would require a pretty loose definition of "advertising" (or an ignorance of peer review and its importance in science) to label DW coverage as such.

snippet.textDisplay: It's not legitimate. It amounts to advertising, and that's against medical ethics.
snippet.textOriginal: It's not legitimate. It amounts to advertising, and that's against medical ethics.
